zh.title: 海量资料：一句话总结
zh.prompt: Based on the key features and unique characteristics of articles '@1' to '@3', please create an engaging and attractive sentence describing the [主题] while accurately reflecting the original content from the articles. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Chinese.
zh.description: 结合前面 '@1'～'@3' 的文章内容，帮我设想一句描述 [主题] 的吸引人的文案，并且要呈现原始文章内容中最与众不同的特色。
zh.remark: 为文章撰写宣传性文案和标题。本方法摘自电脑玩物作者 Esor Huang 的文章。
